Listing man-made features in a broad, descriptive manner to gather general clues.

Depth-First.Explanation: Derives and confirms a specific location hypothesis based on the collected clues.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Identification of Santorini/Oia via blue-domed churches and volcanic caldera cliffs

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shifts from broad clue listing to convergent analysis and confirmation of a specific hypothesis (Oia, Santorini).
